vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.9;
son of: Helon (H2497)
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Helón; jefe; tribu de Zabulón; en tiempos de Moisés; (b)   padre de Datán y Abiram; tribu de Rubén; (c)   hijo mayor de Jesé; hermano de David; tribu de Judá; (d) אֱלִיהוּא ,אֱלִיאֵל   descendiente de Elcaná; abuelo de Samuel; tribu de Leví; (e)   varios hombres; tribu de Leví; (f)   guerrero; tribu de Gad; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利押 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我神是父" 或 "神是父"
1) 希倫的兒子, 在曠野中為西布倫支派的首領 (民 1:9; 2:7; 7:24,29; 10:16)
2) 流便族首領, 大坍和亞比蘭的父親 (民 16:1,12; 26:8-9; 申 11:6)
3) 大衛的長兄 (撒上 16:6; 17:13,28; 代上 2:13; 代下 11:18)
4) 一位利未樂師 (代上 15:18; 16:5)
5) 一位大衛的迦得族勇士 (代上 12:9)
6) 一位哥轄族人 (代上 6:27)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利押 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我神是父" 或 "神是父"
1) 希伦的儿子, 在旷野中为西布伦支派的首领 (民 1:9; 2:7; 7:24,29; 10:16)
2) 流便族首领, 大坍和亚比兰的父亲 (民 16:1,12; 26:8-9; 申 11:6)
3) 大卫的长兄 (撒上 16:6; 17:13,28; 代上 2:13; 代下 11:18)
4) 一位利未乐师 (代上 15:18; 16:5)
5) 一位大卫的迦得族勇士 (代上 12:9)
6) 一位哥辖族人 (代上 6:27)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.16.1;
son of: Pallu (H6396);
father of: Dathan (H1885), Abiram (H0048) and Nemuel (H5241)
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.16.6;
son of: Jesse (H3448);
brother of: David (H1732), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J);
father of: Abihail (H0032J)
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.9
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.15.18
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Tohu (H8459);
father of: Jeroham (H3395); also called Eliab at 1Ch.6.27; Eliel at 1Ch.6.34;
Another name of e.li.hu (אֱלִיהוּ "Elihu" H0453)
§ Eliab = "my God is father" or "God is father"
1) son of Helon, leader of Zebulun in the wilderness
2) a Reubenite chief, father of Dathan and Abiram
3) David's oldest brother
4) a Levite musician
5) a Gadite warrior for David
6) a Kohathite
